header: Sustainable Development Solutions Network - Western Balkans
subtitle: Our network aims to teach sustainable development, support solution initiatives, and localize the SDGs in Western Balkan countries.
featureContent:
SDSN Western Balkans is a regional community of universities, research centers, and knowledge institutions. It is developed as a network for regional countries in cooperation with SDSN Greece and SDSN Europe as a helpful tool for applying SDG and Agenda 2030. Our network aims to teach sustainable development, support solution initiatives, and localize the SDGs in Western Balkan countries.

We engage with academia, scientists, researchers, business and civil society leaders, and development practitioners for evidence-based problem-solving.
benefitsTitle: Join our global network and work on practical solutions for sustainable development

involvedBenefits.header: Get access to academic expertise and work together with different sectors
Contribute to the sustainable development in your community
Get access to tools, resources, and opportunities to further your solutions
